tagline: Sketch of a RoboRallye-like browser game
body:
RoboRace
========

An experimental RoboRace board game HTML/CoffeeScript implementation.

Please see the [project page at GitHub](https://github.com/gavento/robo).

Uploaded testing version based on commit <!--- -->ISH<!--- -->
* [Pre-built](url)
* [Dynamic compilation](url)

  Tomáš
